name: U.N.S.T.A.B.L.E
description:
Take control of U.N.S.T.A.B.L.E the robot and make sure your crew gets home safely! Put out fires, maintain the life support, kill the Glorbs, and pilot the ship until you and your crew get home safely.

Controls: WSAD + Mouse

Source code can be found at https://github.com/Stefanie899/LudumDare49
